remarks: Define the class of all filter bases.  Note that a filter base on one set is also a filter base for any superset, so there is not a unique base set that can be recovered.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Jul-2015.)
statement:
df-fbas $p |- fBas = ( w e. _V |-> { x e. ~P ~P w | ( x =/= (/) /\ (/) e/ x /\ A. y e. x A. z e. x ( x i^i ~P ( y i^i z ) ) =/= (/) ) } ) $.
$d w x y z $.
